verses.verse: "And now,<WH6258> this<WH2088> commandment<WH4687> is for you, O priests.<WH3548>

"If<WH518> you do not listen,<WH8085> and if<WH518> you do not take<WH7760> it to heart<WH3820> to give<WH5414> honor<WH9202> to My name,<WH8034>" says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> "then I will send<WH7971> the curse<WH3994> upon you, and I will curse<WH779> your blessings;<WH1293> and indeed,<WH1571> I have cursed<WH779> them [already], because<WH3588> you are not taking<WH7760> [it] to heart.<WH3820>

"Behold,<WH2009> I am going to rebuke<WH1605> your offspring,<WH2233> and I will spread<WH2219> refuse<WH6569> on your faces,<WH6440> the refuse<WH6569> of your feasts;<WH2282> and you will be taken<WH5375> away with it.

"Then you will know<WH3045> that I have sent<WH7971> this<WH2088> commandment<WH4687> to you, that My covenant<WH1285> may continue<WH1961> with Levi,<WH3878>" says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

"My covenant<WH1285> with him was [one of] life<WH9132> and peace,<WH7965> and I gave<WH5414> them to him [as an object of] reverence;<WH4172> so he revered<WH3372> Me, and stood<WH2865> in awe<WH2865> of My name.<WH8034>

"True<WH571> instruction<WH8451> was in his mouth,<WH6310> and unrighteousness<WH9390> was not found<WH4672> on his lips;<WH8193> he walked<WH1980> with Me in peace<WH7965> and uprightness,<WH4334> and he turned<WH7725> many<WH7227> back<WH7725> from iniquity.<WH5771>

"For the lips<WH8193> of a priest<WH3548> should preserve<WH8104> knowledge,<WH1847> and men should seek<WH1245> instruction<WH8451> from his mouth;<WH6310> for he is the messenger<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

"But as for you, you have turned<WH5493> aside<WH5493> from the way;<WH1870> you have caused many<WH7227> to stumble<WH3782> by the instruction;<WH8451> you have corrupted<WH7843> the covenant<WH1285> of Levi,<WH3878>" says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

"So I also<WH1571> have made<WH5414> you despised<WH959> and abased<WH8217> before all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> just<WH6310> <WH834> as you are not keeping<WH8104> My ways,<WH1870> but are showing<WH5375> partiality<WH5375> <WH6440> in the instruction.<WH8451>

"Do we not all<WH3605> have one<WH259> father? Has not one<WH1> God<WH259> created<WH410> us? Why<WH1254> do we deal<WH4069> treacherously<WH898> each<WH898> against his brother<WH376> so as to profane<WH251> the covenant<WH2490> of our fathers?

"Judah<WH3063> has dealt<WH898> treacherously,<WH898> and an abomination<WH8441> has been committed<WH6213> in Israel<WH3478> and in Jerusalem;<WH3389> for Judah<WH3063> has profaned<WH2490> the sanctuary<WH6944> of the Lord<WH3068> which<WH834> He loves,<WH157> and has married<WH1166> the daughter<WH1323> of a foreign<WH5236> god.<WH410>

"[As] for the man<WH376> who<WH834> does<WH6213> this, may the Lord<WH3068> cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from the tents<WH168> of Jacob<WH3290> [everyone] who awakes<WH5782> and answers,<WH6030> or who presents<WH5066> an offering<WH4503> to the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

"And this<WH2088> is another<WH8145> thing<WH8145> you do:<WH6213> you cover<WH3680> the altar<WH4196> of the Lord<WH3068> with tears,<WH1832> with weeping<WH1065> and with groaning,<WH603> because<WH4480> He no<WH369> longer<WH5750> regards<WH6437> the offering<WH4503> or accepts<WH3947> [it with] favor<WH7522> from your hand.<WH3027>

"Yet you say,<WH559> 'For what<WH4100> reason<WH5921> <WH4100>?' Because<WH5921> <WH3588> the Lord<WH3068> has been a witness<WH5749> between<WH996> you and the wife<WH802> of your youth,<WH5271> against whom<WH834> you have dealt<WH898> treacherously,<WH898> though she is your companion<WH2278> and your wife<WH802> by covenant.<WH1285>

"But not one<WH259> has done<WH6213> [so] who has a remnant<WH7605> of the Spirit.<WH7307> And what<WH4100> did [that] one<WH259> [do] while he was seeking<WH1245> a godly<WH430> offspring<WH2233>? Take<WH8104> heed<WH8104> then, to your spirit,<WH7307> and let no<WH408> one deal<WH898> treacherously<WH898> against the wife<WH802> of your youth.<WH5271>

"For I hate<WH8130> divorce,<WH7971>" says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> "and him who covers<WH3680> his garment<WH3830> with wrong,<WH2555>" says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635> "So take<WH8104> heed<WH8104> to your spirit,<WH7307> that you do not deal<WH898> treacherously.<WH898>"

You have wearied<WH3021> the Lord<WH3068> with your words.<WH1697> Yet you say,<WH559> "How<WH4100> have we wearied<WH3021> [Him]?" In that you say,<WH559> "Everyone<WH3605> who does<WH6213> evil<WH7451> is good<WH2896> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord,<WH3068> and He delights<WH2654> in them," or,<WH176> "Where<WH346> is the God<WH430> of justice<WH4941>?"
